name: Indonesian Teakwood Paraben Free Shea and Aloe Body Lotion 4 oz
description:
Rich and emoilient, this lotion will transform you parched skin! My skin is sensitive and prone to eczema and this lotion calms and soothes my dryness. I'm also a chronic handwasher and this stands up to my washing! 

Made with shea butter and aloe as the base, this lotion will soothe your moisture starved skin without making you feel greasy. Free of icky old parabens. 

This scent...Indonesian Teakwood...I LOVE this!!! It brings back good memories for some reason. Notes of Falling Leaves, Fresh Citrus, Fireside Warmth, Indonesian Teakwood, Patchouli, Amber

Great for a guy or gal.

name: Cinnamon Bun Handpoured Soy Travel Tin Candle 6 oz
description:
Delicious! Warm and sweet scent of fresh baked cinnamon buns drizzled with icing. 
Comes in a 6 oz metal tin, perfect for travel or gift giving! 

These tins can be made in any scent I carry!

Why buy soy? I can tell you that once you burn soy candles, you won't go back to paraffin!

Pure 100% American grown soy wax

Soy is renewable and eco friendly

My candles are totally vegan

All natutal hemp wicks

Premium concentrated fragrance oils

Scented to the maximum that the wax will hold

Dye free for a clean look to match any decor

Clean burn, no soot or smoke

Long burn time, 30% longer than paraffin

Available scents
Vanilla Buttercream

Brown Sugar

name: Rosemary Handpoured Soy Candle 10 oz
description:
I love the smell of rosemary. This candle truly captures and scent of the aromatic herb. This fragrance contains high levels of essential oil of rosemary. A cool, crisp herbal having camphoraceous eucalyptus notes rounded out with coriander and rosemary.

Pure American grown soy. Scented to the max...much more oil than commercial candles. 

All Natural Hemp Wick

10 oz glass jar

Burns clean and all the way to the edge, no tunneling and wasted wax.

Soy burns 30% longer than parafin

ASK ABOUT FLAT RATE SHIPPING!!! Buying more than one candle and going with flat rate will always save you money! 
Three candles will fit in a $10.95 domestic medium flat rate box.
Up to seven or eight can go in a $15.95 large flat rate box! 
Stock up and save!

name: Vanilla Buttercream Handpoured Soy Candle 12 oz
description:
This scent will make your mouth water!
Really smells like rich and decadent buttercream frosting. 

12 oz Pure American grown Soy wax. All natural cotton wick.

Soy burns 30% longer than paraffin
Burns clean with no smoking or soot

I make these in small batches, 2 or 3 candles at a time in my farmhouse kitchen. Scented to the absolute max! 

Ask me about flat rate shipping! Buy more than one candle and save! I will be happy to create a custom listing for you!
